comments.author: Mistah
comments.body: so now we have a value of $1 per coin according to the airdrop ("Get your access to the whitelist and receive in Airdrop 100 O2PR tokens (approx. value $100"). seems legit bro. one of the worst cash grab attempts ive ever seen. wAgMi!!! jOiN uS!!!

comments.author: csa1234
comments.created_time: April 08, 2023, 04:52:11 AMLast edit: April 08, 2023, 06:17:43 AM by csa1234
comments.body: I am the CEO of O2 Protocol, I direct and control everything personally, for a simple reason, security and confidentiality. Regarding the price, short answer is YES, O2PR will have an initial liquidity value of 1 MATIC per token (NOT $1 thats why it says APPROX at current MATIC/USD price) after we deploy the first tranche of liquidity to Uniswap.If you dont like the Airdrop, its fine, we are not here to offer stunnings high yield liquidity farming minting like others proyects do, just to rug on your face as happened all over the blockchain, you should know this by now.The best approach and secure way is a simple Airdrop, and if no body takes it, its even better for the project.Regarding the initials "wagm" that you have put in a sarcastic way, I can only tell you that with time you will see that this project is serious and will be outstanding above all other projects, the reason is simple: we work with a real business model and highly lucrative as is financing and certifying forests for carbon offsetting. This is a real business, and proof of this is our support and certification by the National University of Asuncion, StartUp Lab division, and the entire pre-incubation process carried out. It should also be noted that I have very little free time to be able to sit down and check messages from forums or social networks, since most of my time I have meetings with NGOs reaching association agreements, other DEFIs (one of them very well known, which already is interested in associating with us, for reasons of confidentiality I cannot mention it even until we have a signed agreement) and personally developing the dApp... without further ado, I leave you a copy of our certificate from the University of Asuncion, polytechnic faculty, Start Up Lab division.And yes, I am the same Cesar Saguier that appears on that certificate as well as on our website.If you have no interest in our project, I would kindly appreciate it if you refrain from participating in our community with such negativity and bad intentions. Thanks for pointing me out your "thoughts"...This text written by you, is criminally classified as defamation and slander against me, insinuating me as the author of a crime of misappropriation.I leave a record of the text written by you and I reserve the rights to take any legal action.Due to the nature of this accusation against me and my rights to claim for defamation and slander, I also record that because of this, I, members of my family and members of the project are exposed to any type of act in retaliation by this user, taking into account the exposure of our names and data in public enviroments like our website, twitter, instagram, Telegram, Discord, Facebook, Youtube, LinkedIN, Medium blog, and this forumQuote from: Mistah on April 03, 2023, 01:15:28 PMso now we have a value of $1 per coin according to the airdrop ("Get your access to the whitelist and receive in Airdrop 100 O2PR tokens (approx. value $100"). seems legit bro. one of the worst cash grab attempts ive ever seen. wAgMi!!! jOiN uS!!!PS: Pre-incubation name was DeFy Py by 2021 and switched to O2 Protocol in 2022

comments.author: csa1234
comments.body: We completed our Seed Round, and going with very nice progress our developing on the dApps and our first REDD+ CO2 Offset certification. For those new to carbon offseting, REDD stand for Reducing Emissions from Deforestation and forest Degradation, in simple terms we are in the process of Forest Certification for CO2 Offseting For more news and updated announcement visit our Twitter and Telegram.

comments.author: csa1234
comments.body: Dear O2-Protocol Community,We have an exciting update for you! The O2PR token distribution will kick off on Monday, 26th at 12:00 PM EST. ğŸš€ We appreciate your patience and support as we have been diligently working towards this milestone. ğŸ’ªUnfortunately, due to limited financial support, we currently don't have enough funds to provide liquidity to O2PR tokens. ğŸ˜” Our focus has been on covering developers and operating costs, which leaves us with minimal resources. However, we want to assure you that token distribution will still proceed as planned. ğŸ’«We're actively working on finalizing our Project Design Document (PDD) to comply with Biocarbonregistry.com requirements. This is a crucial step in certifying our first carbon offsetting REDD and REDD+ rural property. ğŸŒ¿ These certification expenses have been primarily covered from our own pockets, as we haven't received any investor support yet. ğŸ’°Once we obtain our first CO2 offset certification, we'll be able to provide liquidity to our two dedicated investors who have provided less than $500 worth of support. ğŸ’µ This is a significant milestone for us. Additionally, we're working on developing our leverage-driven DeFi platform. ğŸ”§As the CEO and Founder, I'm personally working on an AI combined with a machine learning trading bot. ğŸ¤– This bot will generate revenues for our early investors. Rest assured, we're fully committed to making this project a success. ğŸ’¼Please note that we won't be overly promoting our project. Our revenues will directly benefit early adopters of our bot and CO2 certifications business model. ğŸ“ˆ This approach allows us to reward our loyal community members and ensures long-term growth. ğŸŒ±We're grateful for your continued support. Together, we can make a significant impact in the field of carbon offsetting. Stay tuned for further updates and join us on this incredible journey. âœ¨Best regards,CEO, O2-Protocol
